name: Gordon Lubricating Company v. Board of Property Assessment, Appeals and Review, Appellant

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Order affirmed.
Mr. Justice Cohen dissents.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

casebody.head_matter:
Gordon Lubricating Company v. Board of Property Assessment, Appeals and Review, Appellant.
Argued April 26, 1965.
Before Bell, C. J., Mtjsmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagbn, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.
Francis A. Barry, First Assistant County Solicitor, with him James Victor Voss, Assistant County Solicitor, and Maurice Louik, County Solicitor, for board, appellant.
Frank W. Ittel, with him Frank W. Ittel, Jr., and Reed, Smith, Shaw and McOlay, for appellee.
June 30, 1965:
